Comment 8: 
You're writing too much code.

If err != nil, stat will be valid. In fact, all you need I think is to test stat; unless
you're trying to report the error, its actual value is irrelevant.

stat, _ := os.Stat(thingToPath(thing))
if stat != nil && stat.Mtime_ns > twoWeeksAgo { thing is old }
